collection: **What personal information do we collect?

**

When receiving the Services as described in Terms, contacting us, or
registering as a User, and/or accessing or downloading the Services, you may
be asked to enter various types of information, herein after referred to as
“Personal Information”, which may include, but is not limited to:

  * Contact Information and Account Registration: name, email, postal address, telephone number, account user name and password, business contact information, and any information you may provide to us.

* Identification and Demographics: date of birth, gender, nationality, ethnicity, interests, lifestyle information, photos, social media credentials, including identification information about friends, preferences, contacts, or referrals you provide.
* User Generated Content: photos, videos, audio, and other information you may submit to us, such as comments on our forums.
* Research and Feedback: comments that you send us through online forms and social media platforms, by email, over the phone, by mail, or in surveys.
* Device Information and Identifiers: IP address, cookie IDs, browser type and language, operating system, platform type, device type, and advertising and app identifiers.

* Connection and Usage: domain names, browsing activity, scrolling and keystroke activity, advertisements viewed, forms or fields you complete or partially complete, search terms, whether you open an email, content you view and duration, quality of the service and interaction with the content, logs, and other similar information.
If these events occur while you are offline, they may be logged and uploaded to us when you next connect.
* Geolocation: city, state and ZIP code associated with your IP address or derived through Wi-Fi triangulation.
We will ask for your permission before using your precise location from GPS-based functionality on your mobile devices.

* Social Media Information: if you interact with us through a social media service or log in using social media credentials, depending on your social media settings, we may have access to your information from that social network such as your name, email address, friend list, photo, age, gender, location, birthday, social networking ID, current city, your comments about our Services, and the people/sites you follow.
**When do we collect information?

**

We collect information from you when you subscribe to our Services, register
as a User, contact us regarding the Services or any query relating thereto,
fill out an online form, or otherwise enter any other information on our
Services.

_Non-EU Persons ' Consent to Personal Information processing_

If you are not an EU Person, by transferring to us your Personal Information
via the Services or otherwise, you irrevocably and unconditionally consent and
agree that the we shall be entitled, in accordance with this Policy:

  * To process in any manner, including to collect, store, use, disclose, share and transfer (including cross-border), your Personal Information so provided to us, as well as your Personal Information collected from your use of the Services (i.e.

your Personal Information which we collect automatically and/or from other sources); and
  * To use cookies and pixel tags to collect your Personal Information and associate the Personal Information with your computer and web browser.

Please note that we may maintain information about individual sales
transactions or subscription purchases in order to complete said transactions
and for record keeping purposes.

We and our service providers, advertisers, and other third parties use
cookies and similar technologies (e.g., HTTP cookies, HTML 5, flash local
storage cookies, web beacons, GIFs, embedded scripts, ETags/cache browsers,
and software development kits) to recognize you on, off, and across your
devices.

Cookies are small files that we or our service provider transfers to
your computer’s hard drive through your Web browser (if you allow) and/or your
device that enables BLOK SPORTS or our service provider’s systems to recognize
your browser or device to capture and remember certain information.

In this way, the ad companies may compile information about
where you, or others who are using your computer or device, saw their
advertisements and measure your interaction with each ad.

We
also use cookies to help us compile aggregate data about traffic and
interaction so that we can offer better experiences and Services in the
future.

We use cookies to:

  * Help remember and process your orders.

If we make material changes to this policy,
we will notify you here that it has been updated so that you are aware of what
information we collect, how we use it, and under what circumstances, if any,
we use and/or disclose it to any third party.

**Third Party and other Disclosures of Your Personal Information**

We may share your information with related companies, advertisers, partners,
social networks, service providers, research and management companies, search
engines, law enforcement, hosting partners, professional sports leagues, and
other parties who assist us in operating our Services, conducting our
business, or servicing you.

Similarly, if we are involved in a merger,
collaboration, acquisition or asset sale, your personal information may be
transferred.

We may also release your Personal Information under certain circumstances when
we believe release is appropriate to comply with the law, enforce our
policies, and/or protect ours or others’ rights, property, or safety.

We may
also be required to disclose your personal information if required by law or
in response to a valid request by a public authority (e.g., a court or
governmental agency).

However, non-Personal Information may be provided to other parties for
marketing, advertising, or other uses.

**Transmission of Personal Data**

We may transfer your information to service providers and other third parties
located outside of your country of residence.
